subject: Re: [junit] EMMA and eclipse, was: [OT] coverage plugins for eclipse?
msgSnippet: ... Have a look at http://www.instantiations.com/eclipsepro/test.htm I had a trial of the Clover plug-in. The features are roughly the same. You get red
messageBody:
Thomas L Roche schrieb:

> How does Instantiations integrate it? What I'd like:

Have a look at http://www.instantiations.com/eclipsepro/test.htm
I had a trial of the Clover plug-in. The features are roughly the same.
You get red annotations on uncovered-code and some reports.
I found it a lot easier to set than the Clover plug-in.

Frank.
